tasks.task: Construct a confinement hoop barn for cattle feeding
subtasks: Determine the size and layout of the barn
Install a feeding pad and fence-lined bunk
Create a resting area for cattle
Cover the bunk with an eve for protection
Divide the barn into feeding pens
Equip the barn with watering fountains
Select construction materials (e.g., cement pony walls, I-beam supports, truss pipe rafters)
Cover the barn with a tarp and include a roll-up side curtain
Choose between a traditional open ridge or alternative designs

tasks.task: Manage manuring and bedding in the confinement hoop barn
subtasks: Ensure bedding is dry (e.g., using a bale processor or unrolling)
Clean the resting area between feeding groups

tasks.task: Assess the costs and performance of confinement hoop barns
subtasks: Calculate cost variations based on animal space
Evaluate reported cattle performance and health
Consider initial experience and potential for future expansion
